channel.title: Clubplanet presents: Sincast
channel.description: Each month you will hear a new mix from DJ Rebecca Sin.
channel.itunes:author: Rebecca Sin
channel.itunes:subtitle: Each month you will hear a new mix from DJ Rebecca Sin.
channel.itunes:summary: Rebecca Sin lives a double life. As a DJ, she jets from New York to LA and most stops in between. Her sets of electro/tech house have opened for heavy-hitters like Ferry Corsten, Richie Hawtin, DJ Sneak, Nick Warren, Hybrid, and Josh Wink. In her double life, behind the scenes, Rebecca has influenced more DJs and more clubs than just about anyone on the planet. Since 2002 she has ran the website Wantickets.com, the largest nightlife ticketing outlet.

item.title: Clubplanet presents: Sincast 01 - WMC 2008
item.description: This mix of Electro/Tech House was made especially for WMC 2008.
item.itunes:author: Rebecca Sin
item.itunes:subtitle: This mix of Electro/Tech House was made especially for WMC 2008.
item.itunes:summary: This mix of Electro/Tech House was made especially for WMC 2008.
item.itunes:keywords: DJ, Rebecca, Sin, Sincast, Clubplanet, Electro, Club, House, Tech, Progressive, Tech-House, Dance, Nightclub
